content.p: Our strong reputation for innovation in teaching has helped make us one of the leading centres for the study of history in the UK. Effective learning in history comes from being inspired by your tutors in lectures and seminars, but also from your own research, critical thinking, and reflection on historical sources and ways of learning. Single honours courses: Joint honours courses: With a language: Liberal Arts Foundation route Watch our student voices video: Discover campus life at the University of Nottingham with 360 degree images and videos on our virtual tour. Experience student life by exploring areas such as accommodation, student services, sport centres, libraries and more.
